name: T - Emma Natalia
_source: speak;Emma; My name's Emma, and I'd like you to step aside.{w} I don't want to hurt a healer like you if I don't have to.
speak;Natalia; So it's true?{w} Are you hear to kill the bandit leader?
speak;Emma; Only if my mother doesn't get her hands on him first, yes.{w} Why are you here helping them?

speak;Natalia; This fiend killed my church sisters and kidnapped me!{w} He's been hanging my life and their deaths above my head to compel me.{w} Please, let me come with you!{w} I want to get out of this place.
speak;Emma; Of course you're welcome to join us.
speak;Natalia; I'm not completely defenseless,{w} but I fight best from the reargurad.{w} Let's drive these bandits out.
